== A class review comments ==
This article is being reviewed at [[WP:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Skanderbeg's Italian expedition]] for WP:MilitaryHistory now. The issues brought up that are remaining generally involve formatting. If help is needed with these, please ask. -[[User:Fnlayson|Fnlayson]] ([[User talk:Fnlayson|talk]]) 19:35, 26 April 2011 (UTC) :There are some which [[User:AustralianRupert]] mentioned that I don't know how to fix. They range from the third to the seventh comment. Any help would be much appreciated.--[[User:Gaius Claudius Nero|Gaius Claudius Nero]] ([[User talk:Gaius Claudius Nero|talk]]) 21:15, 26 April 2011 (UTC) :Okay, I added some information into the alt-text. Is this what's generally included?--[[User:Gaius Claudius Nero|Gaius Claudius Nero]] ([[User talk:Gaius Claudius Nero|talk]]) 01:03, 27 April 2011 (UTC) :: I have not checked yet. In general terms the Alt text is supposed to describe the image in words for accessibly purposes, such as text readers and for users with slow internet connections. Just checked and the [[WP:Alt|Alt text]] looks fine. -[[User:Fnlayson|Fnlayson]] ([[User talk:Fnlayson|talk]]) 03:50, 27 April 2011 (UTC) :::Alright then. Do you know how to get [[:File:Map of Ragusa.jpg]] translated to English?--[[User:Gaius Claudius Nero|Gaius Claudius Nero]] ([[User talk:Gaius Claudius Nero|talk]]) 21:28, 29 April 2011 (UTC)
== Mistake in the map ==
Ragusa ([[Dubrovnik]]) is mistakenly placed in the bottom of [[Kotor Bay|Kotor bay]], on the position of the [[Kotor]]. Also, on the map Dubrovnik is written Raguze instead of ''Ragusa''.--[[User:Antidiskriminator|Antidiskriminator]] ([[User talk:Antidiskriminator|talk]]) 06:43, 2 May 2011 (UTC)
== League of Lezhë? ==
This article is factually incorrect because it presents [[League of Lezhë]] as one of belligerents although [[League of Lezhë]] fall apart by 1450, more than 10 years before the events described in this article.--[[User:Antidiskriminator|Antidiskriminator]] ([[User talk:Antidiskriminator|talk]]) 12:36, 10 June 2013 (UTC)
